meanings.sent1: The sunray peeked through the clouds and warmed my face.
meanings.sent2: I love sitting outside and feeling the gentle touch of a sunray on my skin.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the sunray as a spotlight for its acorn performance.
meanings.sent4: The sunray danced on the water, creating a shimmering path across the lake.
meanings.sent5: As the sunray broke through the trees, it painted the forest in golden hues.

meanings.definition: To shine or emit rays of sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The morning sunray brightened up the room, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent2: The sunray gently caressed the flowers, helping them bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to sunray the sleeping dog awake by reflecting light onto its face.
meanings.sent4: Her smile could sunray even the darkest of days, bringing warmth and joy to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse sunrayed across the stormy sea, guiding ships safely to shore.
